title: Customer Service Practical Skills Enhancement: Triple E Framework for Technology-Integrated Educational Assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Proficiency in Technical Tools and Comprehension of Secondary Education Environments
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: They can apply the three core elements of the Triple E Framework (engagement, learning enhancement, and authentic technology use) to instructional design
They can analyze the effectiveness of technology-integrated classes using mixed research methods (quantitative/qualitative evaluation)
They can design and apply formative assessment rubrics using digital tools to derive educational improvement strategies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
